# document

**Instance Property**

The current document model.

## Declaration

```swift
@Binding var document: Document { get nonmutating set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a new value marks the document as having changes for later saving and registers an undo action to restore the model to its previous value.

If [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FileDocumentConfiguration/isEditable] is `false`, setting a new value has no effect because the document is in viewing mode.

## Getting and setting the document

- **$document**
